testCase.name: MCard Client Basic Operations should create, retrieve, and delete a card
MCard Client Basic Operations should handle text content properly
MCard Client Basic Operations should handle structured content properly
MCard Client Error Handling should handle invalid content gracefully
MCard Client Error Handling should handle non-existent card access
MCard Client Error Handling should handle missing hash parameter
MCard Client Error Handling should handle retry exhaustion
MCard Client Error Handling should handle other HTTP errors
MCard Client Error Handling should handle other errors in deleteCard
MCard Client Error Handling should handle errors with no response data
MCard Client Error Handling should handle errors with no response status
MCard Client Search and List Operations should list all cards with pagination
MCard Client Client Configuration should initialize with custom configuration
MCard Client Client Configuration should normalize base URLs correctly
MCard Client Error Handling and Retries should handle network errors
MCard Client Error Handling and Retries should track metrics during errors
MCard Client Metrics and Monitoring should track successful requests
MCard Client Metrics and Monitoring should reset metrics correctly
MCard Client Metrics and Monitoring should maintain request history
MCard Client Metrics and Monitoring should handle request history limits
MCard Client Input Validation should validate pagination parameters
MCard Client Input Validation should validate card parameters
MCard Client Metrics and History should track request history with debug mode
MCard Client Metrics and History should handle empty responses
MCard Client Metrics and History should track failed requests in metrics
MCard Client Card Management should get all cards with pagination
MCard Client Card Management should handle empty response in getAllCards
MCard Client Card Management should delete all cards
MCard Client Card Management should handle errors in deleteCards
MCard Client URL Normalization should normalize URLs correctly
MCard Client Retry and Cancellation should handle retry exhaustion
MCard Client Retry and Cancellation should handle empty responses
MCard Client Retry and Cancellation should track failed requests in metrics
MCard Client Retry and Cancellation should handle request cancellation
